name: VirusniaЭД
description: The long-awaited sequel is now in 3D! We listened to the voices of fans demanding more exciting adventures of the virus, and now we present the second part! Enjoy traveling through the already presented, as well as completely new locations, fight with new cells, and even bosses. The added leveling system, as well as skins and BATTLE ROYAL MODE won't let you get bored. I've been waiting for this game for jwa years.
